paragraph: U ___1___ (veliki grad) Zagreb živi moja najbolja prijateljica. Ona radi u ___2___ (nova knjižnica) u centru. Svaki dan čita ___3___ (zanimljiva knjiga) i piše ___4___ (kratka bilješka) o njima. Vikendom voli šetati kroz ___5___ (stari park) s ___6___ (mali pas).

questions.explanation: Locative case (where?) - masculine singular: 'veliki' becomes 'velikome' or 'velikom', 'grad' becomes 'gradu'. Both adjective forms are correct.
Locative case (where?) - feminine singular: 'nova' becomes 'novoj', 'knjižnica' becomes 'knjižnici' or 'knjižnoci'. Both noun forms are acceptable.
Accusative case (what?) - feminine singular: 'zanimljiva' becomes 'zanimljivu', 'knjiga' becomes 'knjigu'.
Accusative case (through what?) - masculine singular: 'stari park' remains the same as nominative.
Instrumental case (with what/whom?) - masculine singular: 'mali' becomes 'malim', 'pas' becomes 'psom'.
